game_description: All Hail the Cook-o-tron is a physics based cooking action game built from the ground up just for VR. Features: * Arcade Mode with an Online leaderboard * Campaign spanning 36 handcrafted levels * Defeat 6 bosses with their own unique mechanics * Master 7 food prep stations and over 80 dishes * Physics-based cooking gameplay enabling assembly of dishes in any way you like * Various customer archetypes with their unique quirks * Casual and Heroic difficulty * Progressive difficulty curve designed not to overwhelm yet provide a solid challenge
review_1: For anyone that loves cooking sims I highly recommend buying this game. This is simply the best vr cooking game I have ever played to date. The graphics are awesome the gameplay mechanics are superb just make sure you chop things slow haha The modes are great the design is perfect and there is some great humour please get this on the main store so others can enjoy it to
review_2: This is a pretty great cooking game. I love that it gives instructions as you play. As others have mentioned, how to grab/slice things takes practice. If you slice too fast, your ingredients go flying! The campaign is fun and ramps up at a nice speed for learning. Mostly, I want a way to play other people.
review_3: ** UPDATED REVIEW ** I previously gave the game 5 stars but wanted to amend my review to add a few more points to help those who may be thinking of purchasing it. I purchased and have played this game since the release date and I'm still loving it! What is brilliant is the challenging environments in each wave that you play. To name a few, challenges include serving as many customers as you can during a storm, zero effect gravity, birds stealing food when cooking etcâ€¦ Furthermore, I really like the different characters such as the crying baby and you have to hurry up and give it ice-cream so it will stop crying and to stop customers from leaving lol! Enjoyable single player game. There are over 80 variety of dishes. Great amount of replayability. You can play arcade and campaign modes, casual and heroic difficulty. The boss battles are so much fun!!! The graphics are very good and the game plays smoothly no glitches. What is incredible is that the game is created by a 2 persons team. If you are looking for a different cooking game with unique challenges this is the game for you. I highly recommend it!!!
review_4: I love this game, it is very realistic and a true simulation to the real thing. It is challenging but yet exciting. I hate cooking in real life but for some reason love cooking in VR. Games like this keeps my VR addiction going.
